website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight and compact cabinet safe that can be mounted for extra security.
pros: The keypad allows for codes ranging from 3 to 8 digits long
Its small size means it can easily double as a travel safe
Easily holds a few documents, pieces of jewelry, or handguns
cons: The included batteries are not likely to last long
Not rated for fireproofing or waterproofing

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE (NONE)
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED FOR MY DAD, TO KEEP THE TRUCK KEYS. THE OVER RIDE KEYS GOT LOCKED INSIDE BY THE INSTALLER. ASKED CUSTOMER SERVICE HOW TO GET UNIT OPEN. SIMPLE ANSWER, GOT NONE.
customer_reviews.author: William Allen

customer_reviews.title: Solid safe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty solid safe! Not heavy and easy to fit into small spaces. Setting up the code was hassle free. So far so good. No issues as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Osco’s human

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: I read other review that said the door was not ritgh, i sent this over to venezuela and end up with a safe i can not open because the door is stuck After my first review i could access this and look, do not close... OMG
customer_reviews.author: Hector Rincon

customer_reviews.title: this safe was dead on arrival.  New batteries were installed after, still nothing works
customer_reviews.text: what i disliked is that this safe is obviously defective. Following instructions, i was unable to set the code. I am computer literate and understand the English language very well...i tried amazon support chat, they didnt answer, suggested i call the experts, i entered my phone number 4 times, and each time i got a message saying use 10 numbers in the input box...this is the worst safe i have ever bought and tried to use. Ive been a prime customer since prime first started, but this is totally unacceptable. Please help.
customer_reviews.author: bryan st louis

customer_reviews.title: Watch my video it says it all!!
customer_reviews.text: Could not open the door for first time I had to call tech support .. they helped me open it but I need to unjam it by knocking it on the floor to hit the outter edge for door to open while holding the handle turned.. and it still gets stuck every time I open it!! Don’t get this safe .. I should return it but .. it’s such a pain and the wait... ugh!! Just buy the right one the first time pay attention to reviews
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Numeric/ letters keypad not LED lite as described
customer_reviews.text: Happy but expected all the keypad to be LED lit as described. Yes there is green, yellow and red lights to indicate status but numbers and letters are not lit. Wanted this to open at night or in my dark closet during the day. This needs to be stated corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2 month. Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this one, but alas. After the 2 month of working, it wouldn't open any more, used a key to retrieve my items. Tried to reset the combinations, followed the instructions attentively, after an hour of attempts of me and my husband, still didn't work. It just wounds accept ANY combination and wouldn't work with $40 wasted!
customer_reviews.author: Taisiya

customer_reviews.title: Hey we finally are going to use this safe and ...
customer_reviews.text: Hey we finally are going to use this safe and no keys came with just mount bolts,how do we get keys
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Banwart

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical gift. Grandsons loved em!
customer_reviews.text: Gave em as gifts to the grandsons. They loved having their own personal treasure box. Holds their video game controllers, birthday money, gift cards, jewelry and “treasures.
customer_reviews.author: CPRjulie

customer_reviews.title: Loud as heck but its worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty heavy safe (which I like) I wouldn't want someone running off with it too easily. I've done thorough research and it doesn't open easily like the others on this site that are about the same price. Its loud when entering the code, seems like its no way to turn the volume down. I guess its good for your security if someone is trying to break into it, you would hear the mis-dial of the code. Its pretty loud. I advise to place somewhere secure out of anyone elses ear-reach..
customer_reviews.author: ShopperQueen

customer_reviews.title: Small, dependable, easy to set up, Safe.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first safe that I've owned besides a small compact and it is very easy to use I had it set up in 30 minutes. I set up the user combination and master combination in 5 minutes and there is an alternative of master keys. This is perfect for what I need it for. I have been an Amazon customer for over 10 years and hardly ever write a review but this one deserves it and it is a positive one. If you need a small secure safe out of the way, I suggest buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: GARY G JONES

customer_reviews.title: Decent item
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. I watched a youtube video of a kid able to open these digital safes without the key or code. Don't know how "safe" it really is but for what I need it to do it's great
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Safe is battery and beeps loudly
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t like that when you are adding the passcode for every number it beeps very loudly. So I was not a fan of that. Now you may be but I’m just thinking of the scenario of a burglar. If you are to have a small handgun or in my case pepper spray well I don’t know that’s just my opinion. On one occasion I was trying to open it and it locked and it seemed like the battery died. When I opened it with the key I realized the batteries had fallen. So that was weird and definitely not cool. So I don’t think I like it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Pena

customer_reviews.title: Large ( relatively)  Storage Area for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I gave my son a .40 S&W for his birthday. We both realized he needed a secure storage unit for it and he wanted extra space for important papers. I looked around locally and could only find smaller units or larger ones at a ridiculous price. This unit is large enough for all his needs and attached to a wall stud for security. It was 1/3 the price of a similar unit at a box store in town, and even cheaper than a truly small unit. The electronic lock with key backup is a plus. Well made unit.
customer_reviews.author: thomas j. stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great safe for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Got this today and I’m super pleased with it!! Works perfectly, easy to set up with digital codes, and has keys to override! Has drilled mounting holes to install facing front or lying on back. Plenty large enough for a couple handguns and still has room for money, important papers, etc. I can’t speak for how it will last yet, but I bought the 4 yr warranty for $6, so hopefully that cover any problems. I got this on sale for ~$38, so I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: WV Mountain Mama

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the most secure safe in the world, but you get what you pay for so it’s understandable. The bigger problem is that after using it for a couple years it stopped working. Fortunately I found the keys to open it and replace the battery, but it still won’t unlock using the code I’ve used for the last several years. It’s not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Silverstein

customer_reviews.title: Great small safe
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen the safe in person. I bought it for my granddaughter who is living in an out- patient home for addicts. Things tend to come up missing especially jewelry, identification cards, birth certificates, etc. She has had her small tin safe pried open. She told me this safe was perfect. It’s built nice and solid and no one will be able to break into it. The shipping was very fast and the cost was quite reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: Door Stuck!!
customer_reviews.text: The door is stuck sometimes after several months. I contacted Stalwart's customer service, Nicole replied to me: "This issue may have occurred during the shipping process and we do ask that you please request a return and/or exchange via your Amazon.com account "My orders" while within your 30 day return period." 1. I can't return something that has been used for several months, and she should know this, too. 2. This can't be an issue that occurred during shipping :D Please arrange an exchange according to warranty, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Wang Xiao

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate.  Reasonable.  Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are easy to follow. In less than no time you'll find yourself opening your safe with the keys provided. Then set numerical passcode within seconds. It works so perfectly that no display is needed. This safe is sturdy. However, the door moves a bit if you use the handle to rock it back and forth like most safes do. When you push the safe's door when it is locked. It will not move. I am pleased with this product. Batteries were included and an easy to follow manual.
customer_reviews.author: KwIsSy

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't house anything too valuable in here.
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this safe to keep my handgun in. It is a VERY light safe, so if this isn't bolted, a burglar could easily pick this up and just haul it away in one arm. It also seems like it would be very easy to break into, by even a novice locksmith.
customer_reviews.author: Borsalino A.

customer_reviews.title: Safe is not working properly after a few months and it's making noises from the door
customer_reviews.text: Just noticed after a few months of use that the batteries died which is odd to begin with. After replacing them, I immediately noticed a scratching or buzzing sound coming out of the door which I bet is related to the batteries dying so fast. My guess is that the speaker is making the noise because it's short circuited and the expected beeping noises are also somewhat quieter. I purchased this product just a few months ago and am past the exchange/return window which is why I'm giving this one star.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Van Horne Art

customer_reviews.title: Could not open
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it it tried opening it with the emergency key and it wouldnt turn:/
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Goodchild

customer_reviews.title: Entry Level Safe for 20 year old who doesn't know he needs one!
customer_reviews.text: My 20 year old son is living in an apartment. It came to me that he needs something to keep his most important documents and hard to replace items in a safe that offers those valuables some protection. If disaster happens, he can quickly scoop the safe up and evacuate(as long as he doesn't permanently affix it to a wall or floor.) I asked him what he thought of it, he liked the size and ease of set up. He understands now the purpose of owning a safe.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. I took another reviewer’s advice and used my own Duracell batteries rather than those that came with it. The safe is not heavy at all but it seems sturdy. It fits all the items I was looking to place in it. I like that it tells you when you’ve input the correct code and can open. I think they can also add a sound or light to notify you when you’ve locked it as well. I use the knob to check.
customer_reviews.author: Hmbvajgrl21

customer_reviews.title: Best deal I can find
customer_reviews.text: Just a sturdy steel box with electric lock and manual key option. Standard for these kind of boxes. I didn't use the battery that came with the unit and went with alkaline ones instead. But the fact that they throw in free batteries for us is a really great gesture. I bit tricky to set the 2nd code. But sure to leave the manual in the box because you will forget later.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Fan

customer_reviews.title: A nice level of security.
customer_reviews.text: I bolted this time to the wall and a shelf. That was the easy part. Programming instructions were a little wonky but I finally got it right. Its not fire safe, but I use flame resistant bags. I keep the originals in a safe deposit box at the bank but copies of important documents in this. Its a little small for my Jewel of the Nile but otherwise its just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fatmel

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Besides the super loud beeping
customer_reviews.text: Digital Sade works great! My only issue with it is that it’s SO LOUD! I wouldn’t think this would ever be an issue with something like this...i like that the beeping confirms that it is locked but I don’t need my neighbors hearing every time I open or close it.
customer_reviews.author: Katy swan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for about 2 years. Can't get electronic lock to work right. Accepts code and takes it once with light flashing green for a split second and won't unlock then have to go thru process again and still doesn't open. It defeats the purpose of a combination safe if you have to use a key all the time. Check out other brands before wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: David Steelman

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough to keep valuables from thieves, but durable enough to add a layer of privacy.
customer_reviews.text: This safe is very cheap so the quality is what you pay for. With that, I can't complain. I would never put anything valuable here that I was truly afraid of getting stolen. That being said, it is still a layer of protection. I locked the keys in without the battery by accident. It took me a whole day worth of watching videos to figure out how to break into it. Could be a decent low budget option to keep belongings away from roommates or kids or just as another layer of protection against a basic crook. Someone who truly wants to, could smash this things pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: roman

customer_reviews.title: great safe , easy to use and set
customer_reviews.text: I have several other safes that I have paid much more money for and this little safe has been the best. its heavy to be so little. you can bolt it down to the floor or the walls. easy to set the lock codes. easy to unlock and I love that it comes with keys incase you forget your codes. the key hole is also hidden from view. if I ever need a small safe again I will for sure buy this one again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie

customer_reviews.title: For my needs, this unit is great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put prescription medications in to keep my kids from being able to access them. It works great for that as they don't know the pass code and cannot access the contents. I don't know how safe it would be to store valuables against a thief. I would imagine if someone stole the unit, they could open it with some effort.
customer_reviews.author: AMU

customer_reviews.title: Keypad stopped working after two months
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these through Amazon and have been using them on a daily basis. One of them had a broken battery cover on arrival, which we taped in place rather than going through the hassle of returning. It has worked as expected to this point. The second safe is now only functional with a key, which defeats most of the purpose of owning this specific model. They keypad returns an error consistently and will no longer open the safe, rendering the safe impractical for daily use. I would advise looking for an alternative option.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Varner

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The battery box was loose and out of place, bad quality
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: This is not a “safe!”
customer_reviews.text: I think the source of the bad reviews is errant expectations on the part of the buyer. Safes don’t cost $40. They cost THOUSANDS!! This is a “strong box,” as my mom calls it. It’s not fire resistant. It’s not where I put irreplaceable belongings. I use it for a piggy bank to help me with saving. I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a good safe for the money that you are paying but it's still a $40 safe. It works good though the code entry is real nice and easy . And you can set it to any code you want very easily. I wouldn't make this your main safe though, 1 it's too small, and second the walls are just too thin and would easily be broken into or lost in a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery box design, can't install the batteries
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because you can't install the batteries. The battery latch doesn't open far enough to allow you to slide the batteries in. Even using a screwdriver you can't push the spring down far enough to get the batteries in without breaking the latch.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann C. Sabino

customer_reviews.title: Batteries fall out; very heavy lid.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid safe. I'm so glad it came with keys because the heaviness of the door closing knocks out the batteries. I have a terrible time trying to put them back in place. They keep popping out of line. I now just use the key. I have been using this for at least a month. The lid is extremely heavy and I have come close to slamming the lid on my hand or fingers. I have to keep it under my bed as I am in an assisted living facility and can't bolt it to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price...fits my needs
customer_reviews.text: Placed in garage in a hidden area for items when out of town. Looks nice and fits my needs. Being mounted to wall gives even better comfort that my important stuff will still be there when I return home.
customer_reviews.author: LynnT

customer_reviews.title: Safety First
customer_reviews.text: It is a little smaller than I thought it would be, the door takes up a portion of the room inside when closed that doesn't seem go be accounted for. But it is secure, I like that it has 2 keys AND a password you can select yourself and change if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Henstorf

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small, reasonably priced safe that is very easy to use. I screwed one of the 2 holes in the back into a stud so it is very secure. If you are handier than I am, you can secure it with the two bolts that come with it. I really like having it. It is big enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Maher

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job fits 2 firearms and my meds only issue is that when you punch in your code it’s loud, wish I could find a way to make it silent but then again for the price basically it does it’s job
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, strong enough, but sound...
customer_reviews.text: It serves as it should. Strong enough, perfect size to store some valuables, guns. Very easy to use. But, the problem is its sound. Whenever you open and close, everyone hear the beep sound. So, do not ever plan to use it for emergency at night to take a firearm out. Everyone will hear it.
customer_reviews.author: YOUNG S.

customer_reviews.title: Good but batteries like to fall out
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as it should, my only complaint is that the batteries fall out very easily so you have to be very very careful with moving the safe around or closing the door, because if they fall out you have to use the key and reset your combo when you put the batteries back in.
customer_reviews.author: caty sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Keeps forgetting the code over and over. Have reset it several times using the same code and it forgets within a week. Traah, don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod P.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I was not expecting much for a safe that cost less than $40. I have to say...I am impressed. It is sturdy, seems to be well made made and easy to program. It is a great value for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Easy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Nice although wish it was a little bigger. Does pretty much what I needed it to do which was prevent my children from having access to my money and spare keys. The door is heavy so it tips forward when the door is open but not that big of a deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: christee mckenna

customer_reviews.title: It is not worth the money. It doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the safe in November, but didn’t have need for it until February. Within 2 months the safe digital code would only work sometimes. Now it has quit completely. The safe will only open with the key. It is totally worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I received this safe today and it was broken as soon as I tried to use it. Two of the corners were cracked. Also the door did not open with the key like it should have since the door was jammed. This was probably due to the cracks in the corners which pushed down on the door and jammed it into place.
customer_reviews.author: Kayli

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure there's nothing wrong with this safe it's just too big and heavy for me
customer_reviews.text: I chose a metal star rating because I'm returning this it's too large and heavy for my purposes I'm sure it's fine otherwise I haven't even opened the box
customer_reviews.author: SJP1

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't set the code on the safe...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions state that the reset button should cause the safe to allow you to reset the code... but I'm not getting any beeps or lights when I hit the button, a flat nothing... So, that being said, there isn't any way for me to reset the code to the safe I just purchased. I'm going to have to use the master code and the keys to open it. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Venman

customer_reviews.title: Great safe and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My kid likes to be a thief and I wanted to keep my things secure and out of sight. Was easy to set up and the directions were easy to follow and to the point.
customer_reviews.author: Lese Denney

customer_reviews.title: A safe way to keep meds locked up away from young kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep all our everyday meds safe and locked up on the kitchen counter. It’s easy to use and keeps everything together and safely locked up from little ones.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyGirl

customer_reviews.title: A place to secure small items and easy to access
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little bigger but it did hold my 90 day RX’s instead of leaving Them in the cabinet. Had to drill a few other holes to hit the studs but not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Call it an Almost safe
customer_reviews.text: Constantly loseing code and needing to be reset, I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Jen and Rick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Break Into. Bought for my business.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this for valuables or weapons. It is extremely easy to break into.
customer_reviews.author: Holt Global

customer_reviews.title: Great case.
customer_reviews.text: Good case for the money. Easy to program and use. There is a key in case you don’t like the code function. We use the code function and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shana H. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Junk junk junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! You get what you pay for. Sellers should remove this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No assistance and return from Amazon and the manufactor
customer_reviews.text: After 30 days starts a problem with the electronic system and the digital safe stopped to working. The only possibility to open is using the key. The electronic system does not respond to commands. Following the manual instructions I tried all the possibilities but the problem continue. On August 10th I reported the problem to Amazon chat and to the manufactor but no one answered.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond Bastouly Junior

customer_reviews.title: Good Size and Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a christmas gift for my nephew and he loved it! Its a good safe about the size and quality of the safes in a hotel. The setup was super easy literally set the code with in two minutes and comes with two keys just in case. now installation if you actually want it mounted is another story you must be handy but if your just setting it on a shelf its easy setup. i recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: destini

customer_reviews.title: As described - works great
customer_reviews.text: The size and ease of use and setup were just as described. We were easily able to secure the safe to a spare bedroom closet shelf. Obviously if someone is hell bent on getting it out, they probably could but it will surely deter theft.
customer_reviews.author: betty elder

customer_reviews.title: Great safe. Small and funtional. A+
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to use. Nothing great or fancy to keep extremely valuable items, but great quality for the price paid. I would recommend to anybody looking for a safe that's really affordable, discrete, and easy to hide.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Work Well
customer_reviews.text: This is lighter with more door rattle than other brands I've purchased but it's also less expensive and seems to work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Its a great safe for just the little things like, passports, birth certificates, & social security cards. Was very easy to set up, and easy to use. Wish it was just a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: There's holes in the safe
customer_reviews.text: There's 4 holes in this thing about half an inch wide. I could take a flashlight and shine it in my safe in one hole, and look through it in the other hole. Anybody can look in my safe if they want to. The whole reason I bought this thing was privacy. Doesn't provide it.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Slim and compact yet has sufficient space. Bolts are included to securely fasten to a closet floor
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Schenkel

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: of course we all know safes just keep honest people honest, bought this for a daughter who lives in a group house. recommended for the price!
customer_reviews.author: mbutler1200

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great small safe for my office. It fits quite a bit and is very sturdy. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna R DeMars

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Super easy to set up. I like that it has keys for back up and anchoring hardware. I recommend this product. The price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: goldeloks

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this safe! Best priced, very roomy inside, easy to use and set combinations with a hidden port for a key if you forget your combination! I braced many but am amazed of the quality , Reliability, and Ease of use!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice safe for excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: Great lil safe. Bought it for my 8 year old grandsons birthday and he loved it! Would be good for anybody looking to safeguard money or jewelry
customer_reviews.author: Joy E Perry

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This safe is perfect for my needs It is easy to get in and out of and is an exact fit in the space I had available for a safe.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Knoll

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This was so neat, my grandsons loved that they could put their money or “valuables “ in and not one of their 4 brothers could get it! Easy to set password.
customer_reviews.author: Lady of Lake Seminole

customer_reviews.title: very "cheap" feeling
customer_reviews.text: product is very cheap feeling. lock is loose when using.
customer_reviews.author: JOE MAX

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Price was very good. The safe is sturdy, easy to set up. Convenient to store our important stuff at home. Best of all we can stop paying the annual fee at the bank!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Great add to rv
customer_reviews.text: Great little safe, lite so as not to add weight to rv, able to store all the important papers we need and easy to concell. Can bolt down so it can't be redily taken. Would suggest for traveling, doesn't seem to be fire safe so probably carry copies of important papers that would be the only downfall.
customer_reviews.author: David Salrel

customer_reviews.title: Know the level of security you need.
customer_reviews.text: a small safe as described, however, it looks weak. Surely not fire resistance. The mechanism is somehow wigly ( not lose). I bought for cheap storage. Not recommended for valuables. Sincerely.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for hard to get teenager
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a hard to buy teenager very happy with this purchase durable sturdy theifproof
customer_reviews.author: Colleen / Scranton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible Product also very hard to operate codes, etc dont waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.author: nikstar

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a smaller, affordable safe than this is it! This safe is sturdy, easy to use, and a good size. Love it. Fits jewelry, documents, handguns, money. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystina Harter

customer_reviews.title: Not for valuables
customer_reviews.text: Would not use for valuables. I use it to store my meds to keep them out of the grand children's hands. It's great for that.
customer_reviews.author: tozz51

customer_reviews.text: The batteries fell out inside the safe!!! We couldn't get it open!! (Maybe user error) it lasted 2.days!!
customer_reviews.author: savannah smith

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: For the size, it's structure, and simplicity... you cannot go wrong. Easily programmed in two seconds. Has the holes on the bottom and in the back from mounting.
customer_reviews.author: M. P. Woognar

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap safe after I fixed it
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped quickly and is as described. Only problem was the sliding bolt mechanism was binding on the solenoid release pin. I had to open up the mechanism and file the leading edge to give a bit of space to the solenoid pin. Works perfectly now. For the money you can’t beat it. I’m not happy that I had to fix it but again, for the money, can’t really expect perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Richer

customer_reviews.title: Keypad quit after 4 days with no warning.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on amazon, came with batteries. Installed the batteries and 4 days later they are out with no warning. Keys are an hour and a half away. Batteries ought to last this thing longer than 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: pretty goo
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. the only problem i had was i couldn't get a drill into the box because it was so deep. I had to hand screw the bolts into the wall. but still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mat Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Nice little safe.
customer_reviews.text: I like my little safe a lot. It's easy to use and fits my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: junk! code only works half the time
customer_reviews.text: sometimes it opens when you put the code in. sometimes it doesnt. this is a really bad thing for a safe.....do not buy, made in china junk....
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Axelrad

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I am retired and this was perfect for the most important things that my family might need if I become disabled in any way.
customer_reviews.author: EdgeHawk

customer_reviews.title: perfect for documents
customer_reviews.text: This is small but perfect to fit in a closet. It was easy to program.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal_aubrea

customer_reviews.title: Racist?
customer_reviews.text: Is it racist if I admit that I only bought it because my cleaning lady is latina? Is it more racist if Im' also a latino? Racist or not, it works. So far no one has steal my sh*t. Me: I need protection Digital-Steel-Safe: I gotchu True story
customer_reviews.author: EdgardoJCotto

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great safe to store small items. Never owned a safe before this one and I am very happy with it. For the price this item is you get a great value. Looking to eventually save up for a fireproof safe and still keep this one as a secondary one.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Diaz

customer_reviews.title: An ok safe but small and not easily programned
customer_reviews.text: I like the safe but it’s not as big as I thought inside. I also am stuck using the keys because the digital pad never worked with following the directions that came with this safe.
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of small. Easy to carry. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The electronic part is no longer working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I have had the safe for 6 weeks, and it's already not working. I can only use the key. The electronic code no longer functions
customer_reviews.author: AFG

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Received this safe today right out of the box the locking mechanism would not work after setting code could hear the door latch but the bolt knob would just open and close would never lock
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable option
customer_reviews.text: A lil light weight but overall is a great buu
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Great for dorm room
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the key. A little hard setting up the code. Great for college dorm!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Cool safe
customer_reviews.text: Its a good safe. Added weight would have been good but it's a mini safe you can mount.
customer_reviews.author: Junomars

customer_reviews.title: The safe works , without any issues.
customer_reviews.text: The safe works just fine. Didn’t expect this quality at such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: John Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest safe I have ever bought. It does the job I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: shanna shout

product_meta.title: Digital Safe-Electronic Steel Safe with Keypad, 2 Manual Override Keys-Protect Money, Jewelry, Passports-For Home, Business or Travel by Stalwart
product_meta.description:
Protect your treasured belongings and documents with the Electronic Digital Safe by Stalwart! This password protected safe is ideal for home, business, and travel, and is a great way to securely store cash, jewelry, documents, passports, and more! The safe can be mounted to the floor or wall for added security, and also comes with two manual override keys so that you can always retrieve your belongings when needed. Rest easy knowing that your valuable assets are protected.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED- Stalwart is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on all of our products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous quality control process. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Stalwart and ONLY Electronic Digital Safe by Stalwart is GUARANTEED to be genuine

IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. Stalwart is a registered trademark protected by U.S. Trademark law and will be vigorously defended.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Securely store jewelry, hand guns, money and more with the Stalwart Electronic Digital Safe. Protect valuable assets in your home, business or while traveling. The Stalwart Electronic Digital Safe mounts to the floor or wall for maximum protection. Rest easy with the protection of the Stalwart Electronic Digital Safe.
feature_bullets: PORTABLE- The digital safe can conveniently be utilized in your home or business and can also be taken along for your car or hotel during travel. It can be mounted on your wall or floor if you wish to keep it in one place.
MULTI-PURPOSE- Securely store your cash, jewelry, documents, passports, heirlooms, and more. Enjoy the peace of mind in knowing that your valuable assets and belongings are locked up safely!

LED KEYPAD- The safe is protected with an LED lit keypad that can be programmed with master and guest codes 3-8 digits long. Equipped with 2 manual override keys, you will never have to worry about getting locked out of your safe if you forget the code.
AUTOMATIC LOCK-After 3 incorrect entries, the alarm will sound for 20 seconds, and after 3 more incorrect entries, it will sound for 5 minutes, alerting you to attempted theft.

PRODUCT DETAILS- Material: Steel. Dimensions: Exterior-(L)12.2”x(W)7.9”x(H)7.9”, Interior-(L)12.08”x(W)5.5”x(H)7.75”, Door-(L)10.4”x(W)6.0”. Wall thickness: 1.5mm, Door thickness: 3mm. 4 AA batteries and 2 expansion screws included.
